description: This file defines custom exception handlers and utility functions for error handling in a FastAPI application, specifically related to HTTP errors like 404 Not Found, 400 Bad Request, and 409 Conflict, as well as exception handlers for ValueError and KeyError.

methods.name: HTTPException not_found(detail: str = "Resource not found")
methods.description: Returns an HTTPException for 404 Not Found with an optional detail message.

methods.name: HTTPException bad_request(detail: str = "Bad request")
methods.description: Returns an HTTPException for 400 Bad Request with an optional detail message.

methods.name: HTTPException conflict(detail: str = "Conflict")
methods.description: Returns an HTTPException for 409 Conflict with an optional detail message.

methods.name: JSONResponse value_error_exception_handler(_: Request, exc: ValueError)
methods.description: Async exception handler that maps ValueError exceptions to a 400 JSONResponse.

methods.name: JSONResponse key_error_exception_handler(_: Request, exc: KeyError)
methods.description: Async exception handler that maps KeyError exceptions to a 404 JSONResponse.

ctags.name: key_error_exception_handler
ctags.pattern: /^async def key_error_exception_handler(_: Request, exc: KeyError) -> JSONResponse:$/

ctags.name: value_error_exception_handler
ctags.pattern: /^async def value_error_exception_handler(_: Request, exc: ValueError) -> JSONResponse:$/
